ing.item: Hardboiled eggs; shelled ond cut in quarters
Each of cooked chicken; cooked pork and ham; all shredded
Each of roast chicken and duck; both shredded
Cooked chicken; shredded or cut in strips

directions.step:
These are toppings for use in "Basic Noodles in Soup #2".
NOTE: The cooked meat may be reheated (before it is arranged over the noodles) simply by placing it in a sieve and dipping it briefly in the hot stock.
From <The Thousand Recipe Chinese Cookbook>, ISBN 0-517-65870-4. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
